name: New Vision (Tufuei001)
description:
---Story---

New Vision is an open-ended narrative horror game. It tells the story of a girl who had just had an accident and lost her eye, but was given a mysterious power. is the perception of sonar sound waves. But after just recovering from surgery found that The world that exists has changed. The world is full of demons and they have the same abilities as girls.
